casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Henry ROBERTSON-EL. No. 334P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of July 2008 by Defendant for Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
